name: Draft Rig
description:
Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.
In this game, you hunt for enemy parts and attach them to your ship, while taking and destroying parts from the enemy ships.

In 2 minutes the boss spawns, good luck.

WASD - Movement
Q/E - Rotate Ship
Left Click - Shoot
Right Click - Hook
Left Shift - Space Brake
Escape - Options

Code and Art by lessergatsby & sineaggi

Sounds by https://freesound.org/
